Articles.Content: The Heavy Lifters crew is a place where you can port your rockets that can get 25 tons into selected orbit. The first rank is awarded to rockets that can get 25 tons into LKO. the second rank is awarded to rockets that can get 25 tons into HKO, Munar orbit, or minmus orbit. the third is awarded to rockets that can get 25 tons into interplanetary space! The fourth is awarded to rockets that can get 25 tons into eve, duna, or ike's orbit! the fifth and final one is awarded to rockets that can get 25 tons into any of the outer planets orbit, or their moons!

3 hours ago, Obama_prisim said:
